title: Kendall Jenner’s Met Gala Lipstick Is on Sale for Just $7 Right Now
description: And it’s not the only beauty product she wore that’s marked down, either.
excerpt: Thank you for putting us on, Kendall Jenner.
text: At last night’s Met Gala, Kendall Jenner stuck to an understated makeup look, keeping all eyes on her exquisitely tailored Torishéju skirt suit and Chopard diamonds. But even a barely-there makeup look requires an arsenal of great products. Turns out the supermodel’s flushed pout was created using L’Oréal Paris products. After doing some investigating, the ELLE beauty team discovered that her Colour Riche Satin Lipstick is actually on sale on Amazon for just $7. L’Oréal Paris Colour Riche Satin Lipstick in Worth It MediumJenner’s makeup artist, Mary Phillips, shared in a press release that the duo was going for “fresh, effortless, cool girl makeup.” Snag her exact shade, Worth It Medium, to elevate your everyday nude lip to red-carpet status. Kevin Mazur/MG25//Getty ImagesJenner’s lightweight, moisturizing lip color isn’t the only one of her Met Gala makeup products that’s on sale, either. You can also snag up to 54 percent off the supermodel’s Colour Riche Lip Liner, Voluminous Panorama Mascara, Infallible 24-Hour Fresh Wear Concealer, Brow Lamination Gel, and eight other L’Oréal Paris products she wore on fashion’s biggest night. We New Yorkers can confirm the rain last night was no joke, so we’ll certainly be adding Jenner’s Infallible Setting Spray to our carts while it’s only $11. With graduation and wedding season fast approaching, there’s no time like the present to get your makeup routine photo-ready. There’s no telling how long these Amazon beauty deals will last, so shop Jenner’s entire Met Gala makeup routine, below, before products return to full price. html:
At last night’s Met Gala, Kendall Jenner stuck to an understated makeup look, keeping all eyes on her exquisitely tailored Torishéju skirt suit and Chopard diamonds. But even a barely-there makeup look requires an arsenal of great products. Turns out the supermodel’s flushed pout was created using L’Oréal Paris products. After doing some investigating, the ELLE beauty team discovered that her Colour Riche Satin Lipstick is actually on sale on Amazon for just $7.

L’Oréal Paris Colour Riche Satin Lipstick in Worth It Medium

Jenner’s makeup artist, Mary Phillips, shared in a press release that the duo was going for “fresh, effortless, cool girl makeup.” Snag her exact shade, Worth It Medium, to elevate your everyday nude lip to red-carpet status.

Jenner’s lightweight, moisturizing lip color isn’t the only one of her Met Gala makeup products that’s on sale, either. You can also snag up to 54 percent off the supermodel’s Colour Riche Lip Liner, Voluminous Panorama Mascara, Infallible 24-Hour Fresh Wear Concealer, Brow Lamination Gel, and eight other L’Oréal Paris products she wore on fashion’s biggest night. We New Yorkers can confirm the rain last night was no joke, so we’ll certainly be adding Jenner’s Infallible Setting Spray to our carts while it’s only $11.

With graduation and wedding season fast approaching, there’s no time like the present to get your makeup routine photo-ready. There’s no telling how long these Amazon beauty deals will last, so shop Jenner’s entire Met Gala makeup routine, below, before products return to full price.
